name: Crown (RedDecker)
description:
A hardcore deckbuilder with 18 unique ally cards that grow stronger as they level up. Face off against hordes of enemies and 3 challenging boss fights. Every choice matters! Any ally you lose in a fight will be gone forever. Can you take back what is yours and reclaim the Crown for the people?

~~ CREDITS ~~
